pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Small Carnivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() True $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Pack-Aggressive $(br)$(l)Type:$() Pack Hunter $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Forests

Journal Page by $(l)Unknown Survivor$() $(br2)The Velociraptor is a small, swift carnivore. It hunts in packs, but can be tamed if found solo/ alone with meat. Velociraptors don't have to be babies to be tamed, unlike some other dinosaurs.
